list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance that has no fixed shape and yields easily to external pressure; a gas or (especially) a liquid.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we all need several glasses of fluid a day
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tất cả chúng ta cần vài ly chất lỏng mỗi ngày

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a substance) able to flow easily.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the paint is more fluid than tube watercolors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sơn có nhiều chất lỏng hơn so với màu nước ống
